summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 discussing a financial records search related to Ghislaine Maxwell and others. It lists transactions from a 'Borgerson' in New Hampshire and references a request from a NYPD/FBI task force to investigate connections to Sutton, NH, for a cell phone target.

persons.name: Borgerson
persons.context: Individual whose USAA checking and credit card transactions in New Hampshire from March to September 2019 are listed and analyzed for connections to Sutton, NH.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a person of interest whose financial connections to Sutton, NH, are being investigated by law enforcement.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a person of interest whose financial connections to Sutton, NH, are being investigated by law enforcement.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the same financial records search regarding connections to Sutton, NH, indicating a potential association under investigation.
Both are subjects of the same financial records search regarding connections to Sutton, NH, indicating a potential association under investigation.

events.title: Request for Financial Records Search
events.description: A request is made to search financial records for connections between Maxwell, Borgerson, or Epstein and Sutton, NH, based on a target's cell phone activity in the area.

events.title: Borgerson's New Hampshire Transactions
events.description: A series of transactions from Borgerson's USAA accounts at various New Hampshire locations, including restaurants, retail stores, and gas stations.

keyFacts: Law enforcement was actively investigating financial connections between Ghislaine Maxwell, an individual named Borgerson, and Jeffrey Epstein to Sutton, New Hampshire, in June 2020.
A target's cell phone had been 'hitting' in the Sutton, NH, area for at least 30 days prior to the request, prompting the search for associated addresses.
Detailed transaction records for 'Borgerson' from March to September 2019 show spending at various New Hampshire businesses, with distances calculated from Sutton.
The investigation involved a NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating the context is related to crimes of exploitation and trafficking.
